Title: In the Saddle
Plot: When another senator dies unexpectedly, Gil John is asked to organize the funeral arrangements. Louis wins the Nevada primary but Robert has to face off in a Pennsylvania debate to cool the competition.
GuestStars: Yara Martinez, Amy Sedaris, Wanda Sykes, Julie White, Haley Joel Osment, Alicia Sable, Cynthia Nixon, Richard Cox, Brooke Bloom, Kobi Libii, Ben Rameaka, Bjorn Dupaty, Amy Hohn, Ted King, Natalie Gold, Willa Fitzge
